data.title: Lego ends advertising with Daily Mail after calls for companies to 'Stop Funding Hate'
Donald Trump signifies he will end US support for Syrian rebels despite their pleas to him for help
Mexican visitors in Canada will no longer require a tourist visa as of December 1st.

Tens of thousands gather in Seoul to demand Park's resignation: organizers forecast up to 1 million people will turn out. It is expected to be the largest rally to be held in South Korea this century to date
Graves of Muslim sailors who joined allies in WWII are rediscovered
Obama administration suspends TPP trade deal vote effort
Turkey issues warning over travel to U.S. after Trump protests
Woman fined 30,000 euros for niqab in town hall
Russia arrests 10 suspected terrorists planning Moscow, St. Petersburg attacks
Hungarian PM Viktor Orbán celebrates Donald Trump victory as end of ‘liberal non-democracy’ - "Western civilization appears to successfully break free from the confines of an ideology"
Pakistan: At least 30 dead in blast at Shah Noorani Dargah — a 500-year-old shrine — in Balochistan. There were 500 people present at the shrine, and the death toll is expected to rise
Swedish Nazi group hails Trump in largest demo yet
ISIS executes Mosul residents, hangs bodies from telephone poles after they were accused of using cellphones to leak information to Iraqi security forces
After currency demonetization in India, Doctor’s refusal to take payment in old Rs.500 notes results in infant’s death
Colombia in new peace deal with Farc rebels
